item.title: 投资者权衡关税法庭判决，美国股指期货保持稳定
item.description: 周一，美国股指期货变化不大，因为投资者正在权衡联邦上诉法院裁决的影响，该裁决认为唐纳德-特朗普总统的大部分全球关税都是非法的。【原文：US index futures were little changed on Monday as investors weighed the impact of federal appeals court ruling that deemed most of President Donald Trump’s global tariffs as illegal.】

item.title: 中国领导的集团同意成立开发银行，习近平获胜
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平与伙伴国达成了建立新开发银行的协议，实现了长期以来的雄心壮志，展示了北京日益增长的影响力。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping secured an agreement from partner countries to set up a new development bank, realizing a longtime ambition in a display of Beijing’s growing influence.】

item.title: 石油交易商预计欧佩克+将在周末会议上维持石油产量不变
item.description: 石油交易商预计，"欧佩克+"将在本周末举行的会议上保持原油产量稳定，因为该组织在一系列加速增加供应之后将暂停生产。【原文：Oil traders expect OPEC+ to hold crude production steady when it meets this weekend, as the group pauses after a series of accelerated supply increases.】

item.title: 世界上最宜居的城市之一，终结欧洲一日游通票
item.description: 公共财政的紧缩迫使维也纳 13 年来首次提高了公共交通年票的价格，结束了每天一欧元、可无限次乘坐市内公共汽车、有轨电车和地下地铁的票价。【原文：A crunch in public finances is forcing Vienna to increase the cost of its annual public transport ticket for the first time in 13 years, ending a euro-a-day fare for unlimited travel on city buses, trams and underground subways.】

item.title: 智利经济活动自四月以来首次出现月度增长
item.description: 智利第三季度经济在采矿业的推动下实现了稳健的月度扩张，国内经济活动的步伐成为今年总统大选前的核心主题。【原文：Chile’s economy kicked off the third quarter with solid monthly expansion driven by mining, as the pace of domestic activity becomes a central theme ahead of this year’s presidential election.】

item.title: 南非农业企业因动物疾病和关税而情绪低落
item.description: 由于南非农业面临口蹄疫疫情和美国新关税制度，衡量南非农业企业情绪的一项指标连续第二个季度下降。【原文：A gauge measuring sentiment among South African agricultural businesses declined for a second straight quarter as the industry grapples with a foot-and-mouth disease outbreak and the new tariff regime in the US.】

item.title: 斯塔默在哥伦比亚大学任职期间经历波折后任命沙菲克为顾问
item.description: 首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）任命米努什-沙菲克（Minouche Shafik）为其首席经济顾问，这极大地扩展了唐宁街的国际金融经验，但却有可能重新引发有关她在领导纽约哥伦比亚大学期间的动荡经历的争论。【原文：In naming Minouche Shafik as his chief economic adviser, Prime Minister Keir Starmer has dramatically expanded Downing Street’s international financial experience at the risk of reopening debates about her tumultuous tenure leading New York’s Columbia University.】

item.title: 肯尼亚计划根据新法于 9 月拍卖 10 个石油区块
item.description: 肯尼亚计划在六年前通过管理石油行业的新立法以来的第一轮许可证发放中提供 10 个石油勘探区块。【原文：Kenya plans to offer 10 oil exploration blocks in the first licensing round since it adopted new legislation six years ago to govern the petroleum sector.】

item.title: 俄罗斯的能源合作伙伴关系正在进一步密切
item.description:
与中国和印度的数十亿美元潜在石油和天然气交易是天津外交舞台的基础。【原文：

Billions of dollars in potential oil and gas deals with China and India underpin the diplomatic theater in Tianjin.

】

item.title: 印尼财政部长在住宅遭劫后誓言改善政策
item.description: 印度尼西亚财政部长斯里-穆利亚尼-英德拉瓦蒂（Sri Mulyani Indrawati）在周末抗议者洗劫了她的住宅后承诺改善政府政策，这是向投资者发出的一个信号，表明她将继续管理经济。【原文：Indonesian Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati pledged to improve the government’s policies after protesters looted her house over the weekend, a signal of reassurance for investors that she’ll continue to manage the economy.】

item.title: BFA贷款公司计划在安哥拉最大的首次公开募股中筹资2.39亿美元
item.description: 按资产计算，安哥拉第二大银行Banco de Fomento Angola SA正在出售股份，这可能成为安哥拉最大的首次公开募股。【原文：Banco de Fomento Angola SA, the nation’s second-largest lender by assets, is selling shares in what could become Angola’s biggest initial public offering.】

item.title: Evercore ISI 称，到 2026 年底，人工智能热潮将推动 S&P 公司股价上涨 20
item.description: Evercore ISI 的策略师认为，在人工智能热潮的推动下，美股到 2026 年底还能再涨 20%。【原文：US stocks can rise another 20% by the end of 2026, driven by the excitement around artificial intelligence, according to strategists at Evercore ISI.】

item.title: 微软现在是大科技公司工人抗议活动的中心
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，马特-戴将关注微软员工的抗议运动。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Matt Day looks at the employee protest movement at Microsoft.】

item.title: 美国法院衡量特朗普关税与世贸组织的关系
item.description: 当唐纳德-特朗普总统在 2016 年首次当选后着手颠覆全球贸易体系时，一些专家希望他能受到世界贸易组织的制约。他们认为，美国毕竟签署了相关规则，而且有一个争端解决系统可以让特朗普承担责任。【原文：When President Donald Trump set about upending the global trading system after his first election in 2016, some wonks held out hopes that he might be constrained by the World Trade Organization. The US had signed on to rules, after all, and there was a dispute system that could hold Trump to account, the argument went.】

item.title: 特朗普关税促使印中修补关系
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济编辑。今天我们关注中印关系升温的影响。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at the implications of warming China-India relations. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 如何防止人工智能引发经济灾难
item.description:
在《Merryn Talks Money》节目中，互动投资者公司首席执行官理查德-威尔逊（Richard Wilson）警告说，要保护人们的生计不受人工智能的影响，就需要国家启动技能提升计划。【原文：

On Merryn Talks Money, Interactive Investor CEO Richard Wilson warns that state-initiated up-skilling programs are needed to protect livelihoods from AI.

】

item.title: 芬兰增持股份，瓦尔梅特汽车公司进军国防领域
item.description: 芬兰政府收购了中国电池制造商 CATL 在瓦尔梅特汽车公司的股份，使这家合同制造商进入了国防工业。【原文：The Finnish state bought Chinese battery maker CATL’s stake in Valmet Automotive as the contract manufacturer enters the defense industry.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦通胀降温，但洪水有可能刺激物价上涨
item.description: 巴基斯坦的通货膨胀在上个月有所缓解，但季风暴雨有可能破坏供应链并推高物价。【原文：Pakistan’s inflation eased last month though torrential monsoon rains risk disrupting supply chains and boosting prices.】

item.title: 丹麦 Jyske 银行赢得负利率案，缓解丹麦工业风险
item.description: Jyske Bank A/S 赢得了一场备受关注的关于对零售客户使用负利率的法庭诉讼，这一裁决使丹麦金融业免于面临巨额索赔的风险。【原文：Jyske Bank A/S won a closely watched court battle over its use of negative interest rates for retail customers, a ruling that spares Denmark’s financial industry from the risk of massive compensation claims.】

item.title: 沙特快速外卖创业公司 Ninja 据称将寻求银行进行 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，总部位于沙特阿拉伯的快速外卖公司 Ninja 正在寻求聘请投资银行为其潜在的首次公开募股提供建议，该募股最早可能在明年进行。【原文：Saudi Arabia-based quick delivery firm Ninja is looking to hire investment banks to advise on a potential initial public offering that could take place as early as next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 分析师称印度 GDP 意外增长受数据计算影响
item.description: 经济学家们表示，印度上一季度出人意料的强劲经济增长很可能被统计因素夸大了，即使美国提高关税造成了损失，也会推高全年预测。【原文：India’s surprisingly strong economic growth last quarter was likely exaggerated by statistical factors, economists said, and will push up full-year forecasts even as higher US tariffs take a toll.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴大涨，新兴市场股市五天来首次上涨
item.description: 在香港和中国人工智能相关股票上涨的带动下，新兴市场股市周一上涨，而衡量货币的指标则保持稳定。【原文：Emerging-market equities rose on Monday, led by advances in artificial intelligence-related stocks in Hong Kong and China, while a gauge of currencies traded steady.】

item.title: 高盛、摩根大通称欧洲股市在年底前仍有吸引力
item.description: 华尔街的一些顶级策略师表示，随着强劲的经济前景帮助欧洲股市走出窄幅震荡的交易区间，未来几个月欧洲股市可能会上涨。【原文：Some of Wall Street’s top strategists say European stocks are likely to gain in the coming months, as a strong economic outlook helps shares break out of a narrow trading range.】

item.title: 特朗普关税打击出口，南非工厂情绪低落
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易关税开始对出口造成影响，商业活动低迷，需求不振，南非的商业景气在上个月有所恶化。【原文：South African business sentiment deteriorated last month amid subdued business activity and sluggish demand as President Donald Trump’s trade tariffs began taking a toll on exports.】

item.title: 南非小组将起草通胀目标建议
item.description: 当局表示，一个小组正在起草关于南非通胀目标可能变化的建议，并将在宣布之前提交给中央银行和国家财政部。【原文：A panel is drafting recommendations on possible changes to South Africa’s inflation target that will be presented to both the central bank and the National Treasury before an announcement is made, the authorities said.】

item.title: 奥地利新任欧洲央行利率制定者敦促欧元区保持增长态势
item.description: 奥地利新任央行行长表示，欧元区应采取 "增长思维 "来克服所面临的挑战。【原文：The euro area should adopt a “growth mindset” to overcome the challenges it faces, Austria’s new central-bank chief said.】

item.title: 贝莱德仍看好印尼多头债券，未受抗议活动影响
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）仍然钟情于期限较长的印尼政府债券，认为这种高收益债券在当地政局不稳的情况下能提供足够的风险补偿。【原文：BlackRock Inc. remains a fan of long-dated Indonesian government bonds, saying the high-yield debt offers enough risk compensation in the face of local political instability.】

item.title: 奇货可居：王丹谈中国科技的飞速发展（播客）
item.description: 在过去的几年里，中国展现出令人难以置信的经济和技术增长，让世界彻底觉醒。但是，这对美国有什么启示呢？甚至对美国有什么启示吗？斯坦福大学胡佛历史实验室（Hoover History Lab）研究员王丹（Dan Wang）可能是中国崛起最重要的评论家和观察家之一，他多年来一直认真对待中国推动技术前沿的努力。现在，他的新书《突破：中国的探索》（BREAKNECK: China's Quest【原文：In the past couple of years, the world has fully awoken to the incredible economic and technological growth exhibited by China. But what lessons are there for America? Are there even lessons for America? Dan Wang, research fellow at Stanford University’s Hoover History Lab, has probably been one of the foremost commentators and observers on China’s rise, having taken seriously their efforts to push the technological frontiers for years now. Now, he’s out with a new book BREAKNECK: China’s Quest】

item.title: 价值 2600 亿美元的日本资产管理公司新名称中删去 "日兴 "二字
item.description: 日兴资产管理公司将更名为阿莫瓦资产管理公司（Amova Asset Management Co.【原文：Nikko Asset Management Co. is changing its name to Amova Asset Management Co., removing “Nikko” for the first time since it was founded in 1959 in a sign the company is willing to leave familiar ground to expand globally.】

item.title: BBVA 在支付股息后调整萨瓦德尔报价
item.description: BBVA SA 调整了对 Banco Sabadell SA 的收购价格，以考虑到这家规模较小的竞争对手支付的中期股息。【原文：BBVA SA adjusted its offer price for Banco Sabadell SA to account for an interim dividend payment by the smaller rival.】
